about_the_game:
**Defend the Castle!** Your stronghold is the key to your power and survival. In this action-packed strategy game, your mission is to protect the ancient obelisk that grants you strength. To do so, you must carefully place your soldiers on the battlefield, each with unique abilities and roles in defending against the relentless onslaught of enemies.

You'll also have the opportunity to construct walls that can slow down the enemy’s advance, giving your soldiers precious time to deal damage. In addition to your defensive structures, strategically placed explosives can deliver devastating blows to large groups of foes, turning the tide of battle in your favor.

The enemies you face are varied and dangerous. Some will rush in for close combat, while others will rain destruction from afar. But beware—some enemies have a trick up their sleeve: when defeated, they split into two identical copies, doubling the threat. You'll need to constantly adapt your strategies to outsmart these cunning foes.

Every choice matters! From where you position your troops to when you set off your explosives, your decisions will determine whether the castle stands or falls. The intensity grows with each wave, so prepare for a battle that will test your strategic thinking and quick reactions.

- **Breathtaking graphics** that immerse you in the action

- **Engaging and dynamic gameplay** that keeps you on your toes

- **A wide variety of enemies** with different skills and tactics

Prepare for waves of enemies, make smart tactical decisions, and defend your castle at all costs. Only the strongest and most cunning defenders will prevail!
